short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The customer is validating the schema structure

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
zkPass Schema Validator: The Schema Validator is a tool that helps customers verify their schema structure and sends feedback messages to the zkPass Dev Center.

How Validator Works: Open the data source website of your schema using the zkPass Schema Validator, browse the web page information you see, and then send the verify result to the zkPass Dev Center.

Key Features:
API Matching: Automatically select APIs that satisfy the schema assertions, retaining only the matched results.

With zkPass Schema Validatory, you can:

Validate the schema structure generated by the customer according to their requirements.

The Schema Validator tool is a client-side tool that helps customers verify their schema structure, ensuring a successful website launch on the first attempt. 

Join the Web3 movement today. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the zkPass Schema Validator Chrome extension!
